overview: Shared emotional experiences demand an artistic interpretation; based on the human tendency to seek common goals. The next stage of human history will take place at another altitude â€” fasten your seatbelts and put your seats in the upright position.
tagline: In what way is human perception affected by the incompatibility of creative impulses and external systemic constraints, and why does this inevitably result in an explosion of inner freedom?
title: The Intermission
